# llms.txt for https://www.refind.com.br
# Last updated: 2025-11-15
# Owner: 89DEV INFORMATICA EIRELI - ME (CNPJ 26.220.882/0001-94)
# Contact: contato@89dev.com.br

# General policy:
# - Access to public pages is allowed for indexing and retrieval.
# - Use of content for training or fine-tuning AI models is NOT allowed.
# - Any access must respect our robots.txt and not overload the server.

[policy]
site: https://www.refind.com.br
owner: 89DEV INFORMATICA EIRELI - ME
contact: contato@89dev.com.br
access: allow
use_for_training: disallow
rate_limit: respectful

# Paths explicitly allowed (public marketing pages)
allow: /
allow: /precos
allow: /faq
allow: /blog/
allow: /termos
allow: /privacidade

# Paths explicitly disallowed (user data, app, auth, dashboards, etc.)
disallow: /app
disallow: /login
disallow: /signup
disallow: /dashboard
disallow: /conta
disallow: /api
disallow: /admin

# Notes:
# - "access: allow" = LLMs may crawl and index public marketing content.
# - "use_for_training: disallow" = content must not be used to train or fine-tune LLMs.
# - For any questions or special agreements, contact us by email.
